topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5595d54a6368726174003f08#post_5595d54a6368726174003f08
I'm not even talking about historical accuracy. In Kung Fu Panda, the main villain Tai Lung was guilty of one the biggest sins in Taoism. Familial impiety. He did not trust and respect his father. Not only was Kung Fu Panda a fantastic movie but it also incorporated so many philosophies and ideologies central and integral to the culture of China.
